keyEvents.title: Crew Debates Fleeing Skypiea
keyEvents.description: At Angel Beach, the crew discusses whether to flee after being marked as criminals, with Nami advocating for escape and Luffy insisting on exploring Upper Yard.
keyEvents.significance: The location where the crew's fate in Skypiea is decided, leading to their separation.

locations.description: A peaceful beach area on Skypiea where the Straw Hats initially docked the Going Merry and met the local residents.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Gather Supplies
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp visit Pagaya's house to gather food and ship repair materials.
keyEvents.significance: The location where supplies are gathered and where Pagaya explains the divine trial system.

keyEvents.title: Pagaya Explains God's Judgment
keyEvents.description: Inside his home, Pagaya explains to the Straw Hats the nature of God's judgment and the trial system.
keyEvents.significance: Key exposition location that reveals important information about Skypiea's theocratic system.

locations.description: The home of Pagaya and his daughter Conis on Skypiea, where the Straw Hats receive hospitality and crucial information.

keyEvents.title: Crew Taken to Upper Yard
keyEvents.description: The Super Express Speed Shrimp pulls the Going Merry with half the crew toward Upper Yard.
keyEvents.significance: The forbidden holy land that becomes the main setting for the Skypiea arc's battles and exploration.

locations.description: The forbidden holy land of Skypiea, also known as God's Island, where Enel resides and administers divine judgment through his priests.

keyEvents.title: Destination of the Super Express Speed Shrimp
keyEvents.description: Pagaya reveals that the captured crew members are being taken to the Sacrificial Altar where they will face God's trials.
keyEvents.significance: The location where God's judgment is executed and where the crew will face the divine ordeals.

locations.description: A location within Upper Yard where those marked as sacrifices are taken to face God's judgment and trials.

keyEvents.title: Super Express Speed Shrimp Emerges
keyEvents.description: The massive crustacean emerges from beneath the White Sea and captures the Going Merry.
keyEvents.significance: The sea surrounding Skypiea where God's servants operate to enforce divine authority.

locations.description: The sea of clouds at 7,000 meters above the Blue Sea where Skypiea is located.

worldLore.title: God's Judgment System
worldLore.description: In Skypiea, those who are designated as sacrifices by God Enel face one of two judgments: either direct sacrifice or facing an ordeal administered by one of God's priests. This system enforces absolute theocratic control over the sky island.
worldLore.significance: Establishes the fundamental power structure of Skypiea and explains how Enel maintains control through fear and divine authority.

worldLore.title: Servants of God
worldLore.description: God Enel employs various creatures as servants to enforce his will, including the Super Express Speed Shrimp, a massive crustacean that transports criminals to the Sacrificial Altar in Upper Yard.
worldLore.significance: Reveals that Enel's control extends beyond human followers to include specially trained or controlled creatures.

worldLore.title: The Divine Trials
worldLore.description: God's ordeals are trials designed by Enel's priests, each with different survival rates. These trials serve as both punishment and entertainment for God.
worldLore.significance: Sets up the challenge structure for the Skypiea arc where the Straw Hats will face various priest trials.
